channel.title: Server Restarts character after log out & in :S? [HELP]
channel.description:
OKay so everytime a character logs off, and back on my server, it takes all there items away, and resets ALL these stats....
I'm using Xscape, and this is what the error looks like in the server "run.bat" looks like.. [url=http://img83.imageshack.us/i/imageyy.jpg/]http://img83.imageshack.us/i/imageyy.jpg/[/url]
Please help me someone thanks :)![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2009, 11:54:56 am[/size][hr]HELPPP.
